widget.name: Global Summit
widget.description:
Welcome to the Intel Capital Global Summit Application! This App will enable you, the event attendee, to start your networking now with other registered attendees, even when you are away from your desk. As this is an invitation-only event, only event attendees have access to use this application.
As soon as you upload this App, you can start to network: View and search the list of registered attendees (including photos and bios) Request one-on-one meetings with other attendees Check to see who has requested meetings with you Accept, decline or reschedule meetings
And you can do all the things you normally do when you attend a conference: Review the agenda and your scheduled one on one meetings Read speaker bios Check out the location and map of our HQ hotel Change your profile
We look forward to seeing you onsite in November! To learn more about Intel Capital, please visit our website.
widget.author: Intel Capital
